attributes.action: Enact legislation which would make it a criminal offence to impersonate a medical doctor or other trained / registered healthcare professional.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To make it a criminal offence to impersonate a genuine heathcare professional, and outlaw the use of the term "doctor" by anyone operating in the field of healthcare other than by persons with qualifications obtained from an accredited educational institution either in the UK or overseas. In particular to prevent the use of the term "doctor" by anyone whose "qualifications" were obtained from an overseas "degree mill" whereby a person can claim to be a doctor solely due to having completed a correspondence course.
